description:
A slope meter with a re-designed form factor that allows it to fit on a ski pole, in your pocket, or in your snow study kit. It mounts easily on a ski pole for rapid evaluation of slope angles, and can be read from the side or above. It also doubles as a handy ski base scraper.

  • Plastic, steel ball mount can be strapped onto ski poles
  • Reads slope angles up to 60 degrees (although you may find it difficult to stand and take measurements on such a slope)
  • Fits in a pocket or snow study kit
name: Backcountry Access Slope Meter
